classData.comment:
/**
     * Search vnode child nodes by id or opts object for a given vdom tree
     * @param {Object} vnode
     * @param {Object|String} opts Either an object containing vdom node attributes or a string based id
     * @param {Number} [index] Internal flag, do not use it
     * @param {Object} [parentNode] Internal flag, do not use it
     * @returns {Object}
     *     {Number} index
     *     {String} parentId
     *     {Object} vnode
     */
classData.description: Search vnode child nodes by id or opts object for a given vdom tree

params.description: Either an object containing vdom node attributes or a string based id
params.name: opts

classData.name: findChildVnode

classData.comment:
/**
     * Finds a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id
     * @param {Object} vnode
     * @param {String|null} id
     * @returns {Object|null} child vnode or null
     */
classData.description: Finds a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id
classData.name: findChildVnodeById

classData.comment:
/**
     * Get the ids of all child nodes of the given vnode
     * @param vnode
     * @param [childIds=[]]
     * @returns {Array} childIds
     */
classData.description: Get the ids of all child nodes of the given vnode
classData.name: getChildIds

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id
     * @param {Object} vnode
     * @param {String} id
     * @returns {Boolean} true in case the node was found and removed
     */
classData.description: Removes a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id

returns.description: true in case the node was found and removed

classData.name: removeChildVnode

classData.comment:
/**
     * Replaces a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id
     * @param {Object} vnode
     * @param {String} id
     * @param {Object} newChildVnode
     * @returns {Boolean} true in case the node was found and replaced
     */
classData.description: Replaces a child vnode inside a vnode tree by a given id

returns.description: true in case the node was found and replaced

classData.name: replaceChildVnode
